content.title: sdr2017_ncsesclass
content.description: A subset of the 2017 Survey of Doctorate Recipients restricted survey data. This subset includes respondents from the cohort of FY 2008 - 2013; The data set is extracted from the 2017 SDR RUF for the Coleridge Initiative training class - Applied Data Analytics, sponsored by NCSES
content.access_actions_required: Access is granted to only those with approved NCSES data use agreement
content.access_requirements: Access is granted to only those with approved NCSES data use agreement
content.data_usage_policy: Please see the NCSES data use agreement
content.data_provider: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics (NCSES)
